data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Iwatsuki, Yukio, Newman, Stephen J., Tanaka, Fumiya, Russell, Barry C. (2018): Validity of Psammoperca datnioides Richardson 1848 and redescriptions of P. waigiensis Cuvier in Cuvier & Valenciennes 1828 and Hypopterus macropterus (Günther 1859) in the family Latidae (Perciformes) from the Indo-West Pacific. Zootaxa 4402 (3): 467-486, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4402.3.3|36 occurrences
